name: ROTATION (itch) (Johnrasc)
description:
HEY HEY HEY!!!!!

A new game has arrive!

Btw this game is a  game about rotating the platform to make the character move to the goal and this game is a 2D Platformer Game that is made from the asset of Kenney called scribble platformer

This is made for Kenney Game Jam 2021

AND this game is actually made in just 1 Hour!!!

Yup It's hard but I manage to do it

You can download this for free or you can give me a donation

 it's your choice :D

ROTATE: A and D or Left Arrow and Right Arrow

Ok that's all THANKS AND HAVE A NICE DAY!!!!

:D
